lead_paragraph: COPELAND--June, on January 26, 2016. Beloved wife of the late Robert, devoted mother of Marilyn Copeland, Faye Rohksar, Dr. Michelle Copeland and John David Copeland. Dear mother-in-law of Dr. Jonathan Halperin and Dr. Joseph Rokhsar. Adored grandmother of Dr. Jillian Copeland, Dr. Michael Rokhsar, Sara Rokhsar Siskind, Robert Rokhsar, Dr. Robert Copeland-Halperin and Dr. Libby Copeland-Halperin. Cherished great- grandmother of eight. Service Sunday, January 31, 11:30am at Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. Donations in her memory may be made to Jewish Guild for the Blind. 1/3
